section.heading: Labor negotiations with streetcar operators and technicians.
section.text: If federal funds are used to operate the Streetcar program, the Department shall ensure that employee protective arrangements for employees of the DC Streetcar program comply with 49 U.S.C. § 5333(b) .

annotations.annotation: as added Apr. 20, 2013, D.C. Law 19-268, § 3, 60 DCR 1709
The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-268 added this section.
annotations.text: Section 5 of D.C. Law 19-268, as amended by D.C. Law 21-36, §§ 6162 and 6163, provided that this subchapter shall expire as of September 30, 2016.
Section 5 of D.C. Law 19-268 provided that this subchapter shall expire as of September 30, 2015.
